hero.title: Turn Long Videos Into Viral Shorts in Minutes
hero.subtitle: AI-powered video summarization, analysis, and editing for content creators who want to maximize their reach across all platforms

videoInput.dropOrClick: Drop or click to select a file

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Summarization
aiPowered.description: Our advanced AI analyzes your long-form content and identifies the most engaging moments automatically. Using dual-branched highlight detection model, Long2Short understands context, motion, and audience engagement patterns to extract the clips that will perform best.
aiPowered.feature1Description: Context aware highlight extraction based video summarization
aiPowered.feature2Description: Tested over real highlight data that reflects true virality
aiPowered.feature3Description: Reduce your work by automating clip cutting & merging, portrait change

autoCaption.title: Auto Subtitles & Captions
autoCaption.description: Generate accurate, animated captions in multiple languages with customizable styles instantly. You can customize fonts, colors, animations, and positioning to match your brand.
autoCaption.feature1Description: Context aware highlight extraction based video summarization
autoCaption.feature2Description: Tested over real highlight data that reflects true virality

footer.description: Transform your long-form videos into viral short-form content with AI-powered editing and automation.
